column1: {% load customtags %}{% get_many_related_rec row.labels row.peak_group_label as label_recs %}{{ row.sample.name }}
column5: {% for mcpd in row.compounds.all %}{% if not forloop.first %};{% endif%}{{ mcpd.name }}{% endfor %}
column6: {% for mcpd in row.compounds.all %}{% if not forloop.first %};{% endif%}{% get_case_insensitive_synonyms mcpd.synonyms as inssyns %}{% for mcpdsyn in inssyns %}{% if not forloop.first %}/{% endif%}{{ mcpdsyn }}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}
column8: {% for label_rec in label_recs %}{% if not forloop.first %},{% endif %}{{ label_rec.element }}{% endfor %}
column10: {% for label_rec in label_recs %}{% if not forloop.first %},{% endif %}{{ label_rec.enrichment_fraction }}{% endfor %}
column11: {% for label_rec in label_recs %}{% if not forloop.first %},{% endif %}{{ label_rec.enrichment_abundance }}{% endfor %}
column12: {% for label_rec in label_recs %}{% if not forloop.first %},{% endif %}{% if label_rec.normalized_labeling is None %}None{% else %}{{ label_rec.normalized_labeling }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}
column21: {% if row.sample.animal.treatment is None %}None{% else %}{{ row.sample.animal.treatment.name }}{% endif %}
column22: {% if row.sample.animal.infusate.short_name is None %}None{% else %}{{ row.sample.animal.infusate.short_name }}{% endif %}
column23: {% for link in row.sample.animal.infusate.tracer_links.all %}{% if not forloop.first %};{% endif%}{% if link.tracer.name is None %}None{% else %}{{ link.tracer.name }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}
column24: {% for link in row.sample.animal.infusate.tracer_links.all %}{% if not forloop.first %};{% endif%}{% if link.tracer.compound.name is None %}None{% else %}{{ link.tracer.compound.name }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}
column25: {% for link in row.sample.animal.infusate.tracer_links.all %}{% if not forloop.first %},{% endif%}{% if link.concentration is None %}None{% else %}{{ link.concentration }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}
column27: {% for study in row.sample.animal.studies.all %}{% if not forloop.first %}, {% endif%}{{ study.name }}{% endfor %}
